EmailTemplate.subject: May Newsletter
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
May Newsletter <[[https://pivotaltracker.com/blog/understanding-the-need-for-agile/]]>
Tracker's new and improved GitHub integration
Tracker and GitHub are chocolate and peanut butter when it comes to software development, and with our new native GitHub integration <[[https://t.e2ma.net/click/arjuvd/mwjrljb/abf4bzb]]>, they practically combine themselves. You can now automatically attach branches, pull requests, and commits to stories and epics to visualize your code at a glance as it moves through the development process.
Git down on it <[[https://pivotaltracker.com/blog/trackers-new-and-improved-integration-with-github?utm_source=newsletter&utm_medium=email&utm_content=native%20GitHub%20integration&utm_campaign=FEB%20newsletter]]>
<[[https://pivotaltracker.com/blog/getting-started-with-agile-growing-great-agile-teams]]>
Growing great agile teams
Although the tools you use every day (ahem!) play an important role in your team's success, the people who make up that team—and how they interact and make decisions—play an even more vital role. This post <[[https://pivotaltracker.com/blog/getting-started-with-agile-growing-great-agile-teams]]> looks at the benefits and challenges of a people-oriented approach to agile development, and how to empower your team.
Build your A-team <[[https://pivotaltracker.com/blog/getting-started-with-agile-growing-great-agile-teams]]>
<[[https://pivotaltracker.com/blog/recovering-deleted-stories]]>
Recent updates: Moving stories with keyboard, Markdown preview, and recovering deleted stories
Move over, mouse: You can now use the spacebar and arrow keys to move stories around <[[https://pivotaltracker.com/blog/moving-stories-with-the-keyboard]]> within a panel. Need to use your outside voice for a story? There's a preview function <[[https://pivotaltracker.com/blog/preview-party-previewing-markdown-before-posting]]> for Markdown for double-checking your comments *before* posting. And if you accidentally delete a story, or change your mind? You can get that sucker back <[[https://pivotaltracker.com/blog/recovering-deleted-stories]]>.
<[[https://register.gotowebinar.com/register/3340380483908130049?source=Tracker&mkt_tok=eyJpIjoiTTJJd1l6WTFOekl3WVRBNSIsInQiOiJQYXlOZlwvakdZXC9EMGZ2dU40Y3BGcDlleUp6TkxuM21mXC91TzBkXC9WSzltSlwvcDhNcHBQdFFGVjdKMXZETVF3SXEyQjRzUTFkMEpGM0pOTTJXSE1MbG5RPT0ifQ%3D%3D]]> <[[https://attendee.gotowebinar.com/register/3340380483908130049?source=Tracker]]> <[[https://register.gotowebinar.com/register/3340380483908130049?source=Tracker&mkt_tok=eyJpIjoiTTJJd1l6WTFOekl3WVRBNSIsInQiOiJQYXlOZlwvakdZXC9EMGZ2dU40Y3BGcDlleUp6TkxuM21mXC91TzBkXC9WSzltSlwvcDhNcHBQdFFGVjdKMXZETVF3SXEyQjRzUTFkMEpGM0pOTTJXSE1MbG5RPT0ifQ%3D%3D]]> What's Trackening now <[[https://pivotaltracker.com/blog/recovering-deleted-stories]]>
<[[https://www.pivotaltracker.com/buildtv/]]>
How to get a diversity and inclusion program started
Diversity and inclusion are thorny, complicated issues, but that shouldn't scare you away from tackling them. Melinda Epler and Wayne Sutton, co-founders of Change Catalysts and Tech Inclusion, join Build to discuss how to get your D&I efforts off the ground—and how to make them stick.
D&I 411 <[[https://www.pivotaltracker.com/blog/guidelines-for-mastering-agile-development-with-tracker]]>
<[[https://pivotaltracker.com/features]]>
Rediscover Tracker
All this is to say that we've been busy since you last heard from us, releasing a host of new features <[[https://pivotaltracker.com/features]]>—from Blockers <[[https://pivotaltracker.com/blog/introducing-story-blockers/]]> to a native Android app. But the best way to see what's new is to jump back into Tracker and experience it firsthand.
<[[https://www.pivotaltracker.com/]]> <[[https://www.pivotaltracker.com/]]> Start my free trial <[[https://www.pivotaltracker.com/signup/new]]>
